alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:15PM MST until February 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Totals 6 to 10 inches above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Pinal/Superstition Mountains, Mazatzal Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on slippery road conditions and potential road closures.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
